document_data.mainbody:
asarial was a female black dragon, youngest daughter of Hesior and granddaughter of the great Thauglorimorgorus. Her mate was Mirantol and she was the mother of Kreston.  
She had a scar over her left eye given to her by her grandsire for being impetuous.
CategoryBlack dragons
